application.name: mar10clean
application.description: This program performs the clean up of Mariner10 images. This includes salt and pepper noise, removing reseaus, and trimming edges of invalid data.

history.change: Modified order of runs to remove noise before finding and removing reseaus.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: The cube to be cleaned. The cube will be run through a series of filters to remove salt and pepper noise and reseaus.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The resultant cube containing the clean data.

parameter.name: REMOVE
parameter.description: Option to remove or leave intermediate cube files made by the application.

parameter.name: SDIM
parameter.brief: Number of Samples to Remove around each Reseau
parameter.description: This number will be used in the remrx step of the clean up. It is the number of samples to remove around each reseau.

parameter.name: LDIM
parameter.brief: Number of Lines to Remove around each Reseau
parameter.description: This number will be used in the remrx step of the clean up. It is the number of lines to remove around each reseau.

example.brief: Input Mariner10 Image to be cleaned
example.description: This example shows the application in action. It removes all salt and pepper noise as well as reseaus.

terminalInterface.description: Input a Mariner10 unclead image to from and output a cleaned image to to.
